product.title: Tuya Zigbee Wifi Smart Switch 16A Mini DIY Light Switches 2 Way Smart Home with Tuya Smart Life EweLink Alexa Alice Google Home
product.description:
Product introduction

. Schedule function:Set timers and countdowns, create scenes, you can set timer schedules to automatically turn on/off your lights, fans or appliances based on your daily habits. For example, you can set your hallway lights to turn on when you get home at night and off when you leave in the morning

. Voice Control:Works with Alexa and Google Home, instead of reaching for the on/off button every time, you can easily turn on/off your home appliances with your voice commands, no hub required, create scenes on Alexa or Google Home, very convenient, especially when you have your hands full with app control from anywhere, you can Remotely control lights, routers, fans, TVs, coffee makers, and other appliances with a single click on the mobile app Smart Life, even when you're away.

.No hub required: Compatible with most wifi routers (only with 2.4GHz wireless networks), it allows you to do many smart projects yourself:smart lights, fans, garage doors, humidifiers, thermostats, etc.

. Group Control:Create a group for all smart relays, one button control, one smart relay can be controlled by multiple phones, share with family, everyone can control easily. Perfect for hard-to-reach appliances and devices without switches. A must-have accessory for home automation systems.

. Compact design:This mini design smart wifi module fits into the wall switch box and can easily be hidden in the hidden wall switch box of your traditional switches without affecting your original decor to make it smart. What's more, your traditional switch and this smart module can work independently without interfering with each other's mode.


The zigbee receiver needs to be used with a zigbee gateway.

Product Description

1.Turnordinary non-smart appliances orequipment into smart;

2.Mobile App control.Control the switch, timing, countdown and other functions of the device through the mobile phone 2. Voice control. Support voice assistants such as Tmall Wizard, Alexa, GoolHome, etc., to realize functions such as switches;

3.Remote control.It can realize the remote control of the light by mobile phone, no matter where you are in the earth, as long as your mobile phone can connect to the network, you can control it;

4.Networking technology. One mobile phone can control multiple switches, and one switch can be controlled by multiple mobile phones at the same time;

5.Group control.The lights can be grouped to achieve unified control (simultaneous switching, timing, etc.);

6.The Internet of Everything.Through settings, it can be linked with other intelligent scenes to make life smarter;

7.Sharing and security.The main account can be shared with other members of the family, and
the functions and settings are completely retained and copied; security: once the lamp is added by the main account, the lamp will be hidden and other users can no longer find and add; it needs to be actively shared before others can use it .
